39136303.review: Really fun game in which you can either save the town or choose to destroy it, depending on your character choice. Hence the name, 'Super Man Or Monster' which is fitting to say the least, given the old school look and feel of the game. Not sure if I would have paid $12 for it, happily atleast. To be fair that is mostly due to the fact that I got it for half off when it was on sale.

38695689.review:
Хммм , ни одного русского обзора? Надо это исправить!
Ну , поехали!

Super Man or Monster является довольно прикольным представителем своего жанра

Разберём же плюсы и минусы данного проектика :
+
*Локальный мультиплеер
*Оптимизация
*Вариативность (хочешь крушить города? Иди за монстра! НЕ хочешь крушить города? П*ЗДУЙ В ГОРОД , ТАМ ГОДЗИЛЛА ВСЁ КРУШИТ)
*Здесь можно обыгрывать фильмы про Кайдзю (ﾉﾟ▽ﾟ)ﾉ (ток вместо атомного дыхания у Годзиллы ядерный пердёж , но да не суть)
*Довольно приятная графика (если сменить в настройках , но об этом по позже)

-
*Музыка , один и тот же саундтрек...
*Имбовость некоторых монстров (второй монстр тупо в один клик способки разносит город в щепки)
*Графика ("А почему же ты отметил графику в плюсах и минусах?" , спросите вы , а я отвечу... ПО СТАНДАРТУ СТОИТ ДОЛБАННЫЙ РЕТРО СТИЛЬ!!! Пока разберёшься в найстройках твои глаза просто расплавятся от этой замыленной пиксельной пиксельной графики , то ещё сочетание...)
*Отсутвие мультиплеера по сети (хотелось бы зарубиться с другом по сети... Надеюсь это добавят)
*Цена (не большой минус , но всё же , красная цена этой игре ~150-200 рублей)

В итоге вы получаем довольно добротную игрулю , которой хватит скоротать пару вечеров в соло режиме , либо же 1-2 недели рубиться в это локально с кем нибудь из друзей

8,75 пердящих Кайдзю из 10 "ДА КАК ТЫ МЕНЯ ЗАВАЛИЛ?!"

38381051.review: You can't run this game in a 4K resolution (3840 X 2160 or 4096 X 2160)! This game is great, but there is no excuse for not supporting a resolution over 720P!

38049777.review: VERY NICE GAME! MY KID AND I LIKED IT VERY MUCH! please allow multiple type of units for the MAN to initially deploy in splitscreen and Increase the number.  Looking forward for more improvements! Thanks for this cool game =)

37914398.review:
Alright, let me get this out of the way first. This is my favorite steam game. Its so fun. And ill tell you why.

Pros

-Tons of awesome monsters to pick from and destroy stuff with!

-Man is super epic to play as, seeing giant monsters charge at you is so epic and scary!

-Pretty long, 2 campaigns with multiple takes on the game, and are both equally fun to play.

-Graphics. I dont like pixelated games usually but this is by far my favorite pixelated game. I love the art style, it fits the game really well!

-Awesome music! The chiptunes sound just right in the game, and theyre super catchy and epic.

-Splitscreen! Its super fun to play with friends! Tons of fun times!

Now onto cons. A few but they arent to big, doesnt ruin the game at all.
Cons

-No monster vs monster. When you think of giant monsters you think of them fighting, but no fighting here. 

-Lacking in game modes. Only 2 campaigns, and while fun you just do the same thing over and over.

-Splitscreen. Yes it is a pro but it is a little weird. As man you only get 1 type of infantry you can spawn, and you have to find crates to get more. So to even make it fair, I have to act really stupid as the monster in split screen and not destroy to much. And most monsters are way to op, its almost never fair for man since you only get 1 choice of infantry, and get random pickups. Only really fairyou pick weaker monsters.

-No online!? I want to play with my friends on steam, and since theirs no online i have to invite my actual friends over, and thats only sometimes if they even can, reducing my enjoyment of the game. Also meaning i cant play with my steam friends. I know you would have to rebuild the entire game but its something that would have been nice.

Game is definetly worth the cash. Buy it if you have enough, the developers deserve it.

36523235.review:
Jogo simples, mas com um objectivo divertido. Joguei em Sliptscreen e digo que foi bastante engraçado. Gostei do gameplay, está fluído, e os modos também estão bem trabalhados em que podemos escolher qual dos lados queremos jogar, depois tem um sistema de desbloqueio de personagens e power ups que dão mais vida ao jogo e o seu estilo visual em pixel trás a alma retro ao jogo. 36309873.review:
Great game, it's definantly the best kaiju game out there, without even being a licensed godzilla product, it catures every essential feature oe should have. The game it captures it all perfectly how fun smashing or defending cities should be. 

The gameplay is fun for both campaigns and i can see myself running through the game multiple times just for fun.

The developers are open and accept reasonable critisism and are well deserving of support. This game deserves a great deal of love and attention in order to allow these brilliant guys to carry on with further projects and titles, be they using this IP or another. Worth the price and worth the time Visually stunning, designs are unique and iconic in their own way without feeling stale. Designs of everything suits the game perfectly and are aesthetically pleasing.

36266384.review: I think this game is hilarious!  Decide what you want to be, a man or a monste. It's just awesome for couch gaming since it has splitscreen multiplayer. One is monster and one is man.  It looks very nice, and is a lot fun. Enough to do in the game, i love it!  It's worth every penny!

36250141.review:
This game is super-pixelated. Normally, I dislike pixelation, I think it's done by far too many games which would do better visually when they would use more modern visuals.
But not with this game as the style fits the gameplay and the theme perfectly. The great monster films are in the same past as pixelated graphics, so no other visual style would be fitting. It could do a bit less though, and fortunately, the developers included a graphics option to do just that.

The game is build on a pretty simple concept and doesn't have a lot of depth, but is fun to play. If you're an experienced gamer, you can just play around a bit for the first few levels until it gets challenging.
Playing as man or monster is both equally a very fun experience but playing as man certainly more challenging. The choice to offer both experiences is a good one and very rewarding. You can even play locally multiplayer in split-screen, a feature that gets more rare every day. If games could be traded like trade cards, this game would be worth a lot because of it.

36235623.review:
Version améliorée et complétée de Man or Monster, en jeu gratuit sur navigateur, SMoM est bien fandard. Les deux côtés sont très différent à jouer, et il est autant plaisant de détruire des "villes thématiques" (Paris n'est Paris que grâce à la Tour Eiffel), que d'essayer des les défendre.

Oui, le jeu est très limité au final, oui il a par mal de couac dans sa maniabilité et son interface, oui la personnalisation (surtout des monstres) pourrait être bien plus avancée...

Mais essentiellement, oui, le jeu est marrant, et c'est ça qui compte.

À noter, on peut désactiver l'espèce de filtre abominable soit disant "retro", pour avoir un visuel bien plus propre, sans bavure.

À noter aussi, j'ai eu le jeu gratuitement pensant qu'il était aussi sur Linux, mais au final il tourne via WINE, avec quelques bugs de curseur de temps en temps. Pour patienter jusqu'au portage Linux, ça ira.

-Só controles com xinput funcionam e não da pra usar o x360ce

36173880.review: Super Man or Monster is a fantastic game that hearkens back to the days when video games were fun! You play as man or monster either destroying a city or trying to stop a monster from the same thing. Fun gameplay, great visuals and a ton of heart make this a game worth getting. There's also two player couch co-op for some monster blasting and city smashing good times. (Here is my video review if you prefer that format) https://youtu.be/C7-lKemUFPc  There are 12 levels that can be played from either perspective and their are upgrades for both characters as well. The game boasts 3 objectives per level that can be completed including score, time and hidden object recovery. I really love what the devs have done here, and look forward to future projects from them. My only real negative here is that the monsters are at times painfully slow moving, but that's really there to balance things out bit so not much could really be done to improve this minor annoyance.

36165941.review: Typically not my type of game, but as I got it through a friend I did give it go and... I loved it!  It's simple and fun, you can smash buildings while killing mindkind. A true godzilla experience ;)
